value.summary: All four JSON outputs are faithful to the provided line-numbered report and are practically useful for downstream review. Quantitative values (dayside brightness temperature 342 ± 22 K; heat transport efficiency ε = 0.19 +0.23/−0.14; Bond albedo < 0.08; 15 µm CO2 band depth 96 ppm; likelihood ratio 7.4; pressure scale 0.3–1.0 bar) match the report exactly (L27–L32) and are not embellished. The main qualitative conclusions and caveats are captured without overstatement: the no-atmosphere model’s/
